leetcode01 ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

c++ä¸­map

C++ä¸­çš„STLä¸­mapç”¨æ³• 12.åŸºæœ¬æ“ä½œå‡½æ•°

æ˜ å°„ åº•å±‚å®ç° æ˜¯å¦æœ‰åº æ•°å€¼æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥é‡å¤ èƒ½å¦æ›´æ”¹æ•°å€¼ æŸ¥è¯¢æ•ˆç‡ å¢åˆ æ•ˆç‡
std::map çº¢é»‘æ ‘ keyæœ‰åº keyä¸å¯é‡å¤ keyä¸å¯ä¿®æ”¹ O(logn) O(logn)
std::multimap çº¢é»‘æ ‘ keyæœ‰åº keyå¯é‡å¤ keyä¸å¯ä¿®æ”¹ O(logn) O(logn)
std::unordered_map å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ keyæ— åº keyä¸å¯é‡å¤ keyä¸å¯ä¿®æ”¹ O(1) O(1)

c++ä¸­vector

vectorçš„ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•

hashmapä»£ç 

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> twoSum(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        vector<int> answer;
        map<int,int> hash;
        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); ++i)hash[nums[i]]=i;//æ·»åŠ maphash.value
        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); ++i){
            //if((hash.count(target-nums[i]))!=0 && (nums[i]*2!=target))//input[3,3] 6, output[0,1]
            if((hash.count(target-nums[i]))!=0 && (i!=hash[target-nums[i]])){//countæŸ¥æ‰¾maphash.keyæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨è¿”å›1ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›0
                answer.push_back(i);//vectorååŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
                answer.push_back(hash[target-nums[i]]);
                break;
            }
        }
        return answer;
    }
};
